job.title: Data Analyst
job.description: stronguCE Data AnalystbrbrustrongFidelity TalentSource is your destination for discovering your next temporary role at Fidelity Investments We are currently sourcing for a Client Experience Data Analyst to work in Smithfield Rhode IslandbrbrstrongThe RolebrbrstrongThe role that this individual will be playing primarily centers around account scrubbing which is required when firms are converting onto the FI platform from another clearing provider In addition to this important task this individual will also assist in monitoring and supporting an internal email inbox for requests that are submitted by internal business partnersbrbrstrongThe Expertise And Skills You Bringbrstrongulli1 years professional experience in financial services preferredliliNew account opening process in financial services preferredliliGreat ability to prioritize  multitask requests being receivedliliExpertly attention to detail and retention of takeaways uncoveredliliDocumenting and conveying results to lead Data Analyst and management teamliliAbility to work independently and execute on daily workloadbrbrliulstrongKey Activities Include The FollowingbrstrongulliBased off error reports perform account level updates to various data fields on each account using FBSI screens mainframe in conversion regionliliTrack and document issuesquestions for review with the lead Data Analyst supporting the conversionliliAssist in the creation of welcome kits electronic documents  forms that are signed by new advisors joining our firmliliFacilitates ordering marketing collateral brochures and supplies that are sent to new advisors onboarding onto our platformbrbrliulstrongThe TeambrstrongulliThe CE Data Analysts job role focuses on performing detailed analysis of clients brokerage account data coordinating and administering the endtoend process for account paperwork creation with prefill of data leading internal account transfer events and the coordinating internal and external movement of accounts for clients transitioning within or exiting the financial services business The Data Analyst is expected to have a detailed understanding of the Fidelitys mainframe FBSI customer account forms MS Office especially Excel as well as various Fidelity Institutional FI brokerage products and servicesbrbrliulstrongCOVID Work Policy brbrstrongSafety is our top priority Once we can be together in person with fewer safety measures this role will follow our dynamic working approach Youll be spending some of your time onsite depending on the nature and needs of your rolebrbrstrongDynamic Working  Post Pandemic brbrstrongOur aim is to combine the best of working offsite with coming together in person For most teams this means a consistent balance of working from home and office that supports the needs of your role experience level and working stylebrbrYour success and growth is important to us so youll want to enjoy the benefits of coming together in person  face to face learning and training quality time with your manager and teammates building your career network making friends and taking full advantage of cultural and social experiences Fidelity provides for youbrbrstrongCompany OverviewbrbrstrongFidelity TalentSource is the inhouse temporary staffing provider for Fidelity Investments one of the largest and most diversified global financial services firms in the industry We welcome individuals from all backgrounds including technology and customer service to fill assignments across Fidelitys USbased regional and investor center locations If you would like to experience Fidelitys supportive and collaborative culture while expanding your skill set and developing your professional network consider a role with Fidelity TalentSource Apply today at FTSJobscombrbremWe believe that the most effective way to attract develop and retain a diverse workforce is to build an enduring culture of inclusion and belongingbrbrFidelity TalentSource will reasonably accommodate applicants with disabilities who need adjustments to participate in the application or interview process To initiate a request for an accommodation please contact our HR team at HR ftsjobscom brbremstrongInformation About Fidelity InvestmentsbrbrstrongAt Fidelity Investments our customers are at the heart of everything we do As a privately held company with a rich 75year history our mission has remained the same since our founding emto strengthen the financial wellbeing of our clientsem We help people invest and plan for their future We assist companies and nonprofit organizations in delivering benefits to their employees And we provide institutions and independent advisors with investment and technology solutions to help invest their own clients money For information about working at Fidelity visit FidelityCareerscombrbrFidelity Investments and Fidelity TalentSource are equal opportunity employersbrbr
